description: Inactivir® PLUS is a guanidine-based buffer that uses an alternate REACH-compliant detergent. Under REACH regulations Triton X-100 should not be used from 2021 onwards and is only in current large-scale use due to pandemic exclusions. This buffer is REACH compliant and features an improved buffer system for stabilisation of RNA in samples.
name: Viral Inactivation Buffer Inactivir PLUS
